content: No one shall be held in slavery or servitude; slavery and the slave trade shall be prohibited in all their forms.
translations: ita:Nessun individuo potrà essere tenuto in schiavitù o in servitù; la schiavitù e la tratta degli schiavi saranno proibite
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by jakov (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
